adRNJrZzTAs.author: AntiConfusion
adRNJrZzTAs.description:
Validations are must in any form otherwise end user won't be able to get what's wrong & can also enter any value which will make further problems.

In this video I added validations in two manners, you can use one which you like.
Don't forget to subscribe, like & share..
